Website of Anthony Brown

Welcome to my site! I am a full time student pursuing a degree in web design and interactive media at the New England Institute of Art.

I have decided to do two sites one (this one) is for my code and thoughts and findings on web development in general. I am using Jekyll, A blog aware static web page generator or something to that liking.Jekyll is a Ruby gem, and I really like Ruby!
